metadata.title: CVE-2018-0487 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
ARM mbed TLS before 1.3.22, before 2.1.10, and before 2.7.0 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (bufferoverflow) via a crafted certificate chain that is mishandled duringRSASSA-PSS signature verification within a TLS or DTLS session.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto1 - 2.7.0-2
libmbedtls10 - 2.7.0-2
libmbedx509-0 - 2.7.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.0-2').
